column2: "Yes, we will award you a Mag license. We look forward to your continued success."
"Well, now that we've got all the official stuff out of the way, let me add a few words of my own."
"From this point on, this Mag will be with you forever. Raise it carefully."

"A new Client Order is available for Hans.

Hans can be found in the Gate Area, west of the Quest Counters."

"A new Client Order is available for Amelin.

Amelin can be found in the Shop Area, Monument Plaza."

"A new Client Order is available for Echo.

Echo can be found in the Gate Area, near the Class Counter."

"A new Client Order is available for Io.

Io can be found in the Shop Area, Monument Plaza."

"Owning a Mag does nothing by itself. A Mag must be equipped to have an effect. To equip a Mag, open the list of Mags from the main menu, choose the Mag you wish to equip and select \"Equip Mag\".

When a Mag is equipped, it grants you various effects, such as stat boosts and support in combat.

When a Pet is equipped, your Mag is hidden, but its stats and support effects will still be received as usual."
